key_insights: The resume starts with an outdated salutation 'Dear Sir/Madam' and an unprofessional email address 'Linusokello8@gmail.com'
The resume lacks a clear professional summary or objective statement
The resume includes irrelevant information such as 'ABOUT ME'
The resume includes inconsistent formatting and readability
The resume includes grammatical errors such as 'few years of hands -on expertise' and 'be it working solo or using GitHub in team'
The resume includes redundant information such as 'Currently in the 3rd year of study showcasing commitment and progress'
The resume lacks specific accomplishments or achievements in the experience section
The resume lacks a clear call-to-action or next steps for the hiring manager
The resume lacks consistent branding and formatting throughout
The resume lacks a clear focus on specific job titles or industries
The resume includes irrelevant contact information such as 'Maseno - kombewa Road, Kisumu, 40100, Kenya'
improvement_suggestions: Update the salutation to a more professional one such as 'Dear Hiring Manager'
Include a clear professional summary or objective statement
Remove irrelevant sections such as 'ABOUT ME'
Ensure consistent formatting and readability throughout the resume
Correct grammatical errors and ensure proper use of tenses
Remove redundant information such as 'Currently in the 3rd year of study showcasing commitment and progress'
Include specific accomplishments or achievements in the experience section
Include a clear call-to-action or next steps for the hiring manager
Ensure consistent branding and formatting throughout the resume
Focus on specific job titles or industries to increase relevance and customization
Remove irrelevant contact information such as 'Maseno - kombewa Road, Kisumu, 40100, Kenya'
